titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the preventing of the exportation of wools, wool-fells, woollen-yarn, fullers-earth, and other scouring earths, out of this kingdom
Proclamations. 1660-09-15
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at our court at Whitehal the fifteenth day of September, in the twelfth year of our reign, 1660.
Arms 62; Steele notation: of We 2) Wool- 3) Pre- due.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C.
